statement.p: A city's population in the year \displaystyle{x}=1991 was \displaystyle{y}=4,008,400. In 1950 the population was 3,987,900.
Compute the slope of the population growth (or decline) and choose the most accurate statement from the following:

ol.li: The population is increasing at a rate of 500 people per year.
The population is increasing at a rate of 350 people per year.
The population is decreasing at a rate of 350 people per year.
The population is increasing at a rate of 700 people per year.
The population is decreasing at a rate of 700 people per year.
The population is decreasing at a rate of 500 people per year.

ul.li: A: The population is increasing at a rate of 500 people per year.
